subject: Baseball
Television
lead_paragraph: Fox’s Tim McCarver compared the Mets’ 6-hour-53-minute game Saturday to a frat party, a beer-league game and a fairy tale, and he said he only left the booth once.
snippet: Fox’s Tim McCarver compared the Mets’ 6-hour-53-minute game Saturday to a frat party, a beer-league game and a fairy tale, and he said he only left the booth once.
